Package entity.roles

Class HDBOfficer

java.lang.Object
entity.roles.User
entity.roles.Applicant
entity.roles.HDBOfficer
public class HDBOfficer extends Applicant
Represents an HDB Officer who can apply for flats, handle enquiries, and manage assigned BTO projects.

      Returns:
